1. '''Chat client can connect to the following services'''
  a. AIM
  b. Windows Live Messenger
  c. Yahoo Messenger
  d. QQ 
  e. Jabber
  f. ICQ
  g. MySpace IM.

2. '''Chat client supports popular feature on each service'''
** Emoticons
** File Send
** Away/Busy status
** Custom font

1. '''Chat client supports the following features'''
** Multiple IM sessions at once
** Buddy notifications
** Private secure conversation 
2. '''Chat client supports features in combination with all others'''
** Multiple protocols in different sessions
** Secure connection sessions with non-secure
** Buddy notifications work with multiple protocols
** All other popular features work with multi protocol/sessions

1. '''Setting up an irc account'''
** Click on Pidgin-im icon
** Click on Add
** Type in you details
** That's it irc up and running.
** Repeat test for other im systems that you have.
